amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. Each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce each amount made available by this bill by 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 272 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 272 (Roll no. 595).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A071) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
